import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Avatar from './avatar'; import DateFormater from './date-formater'; import CoverImage from './cover-image'; import Author from 'types/author'; type Props = { title: string coverImage: string date: string excerpt: string author: Author slug: string } const HeroPost = ({ title, coverImage, date, excerpt, author, slug, }: Props) => { return (

{title}

{excerpt}

) } export default HeroPost
